name.jp: ジャイアントモンスター召喚のオーブ(C)

description.en: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.br: Pode invocar um dos Gigantes: Carrierbomb, Hopper, Mushpoie, Iren ou Watangka em algum lugar próximo. Para usar, clique duas vezes no item e depois selecione uma área no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能够召唤出爆破者、依蛾、蘑菇人、刀尾蚊、巫民其中之一的晶球。
description.de: Ein Giant Carrierbomb, Giant Hoppre, Giant Mushpoie, Giant Iren oder Giant Watangka werden in deiner Nähe beschworen.
description.fi: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un des géants suivants : Caboom, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren ou Watangka. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Akan memanggil Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren atau Watangka di dekatnya. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.jp: キャリアボム、ホップル、マッシュポワ、アイレン、ワタングカの中でどれか1匹のジャイアントモンスターを召喚するオーブ。使用してから召喚したい地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 캐리아붐, 하프레, 머쉬포이, 아이렌, 와탕카 중 한 종류의 거대 몬스터를 소환 하는 구슬
description.nl: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.sp: Invoca a uno de los siguientes Gigantes: Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren o Watangka. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Will summon a Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren or Watangka nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.th: จะเรียก Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren หรือ Watangka ออกมาใกล้ๆ ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่บนพื้นเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能夠召喚出粉大的炸彈客、假面黃金蝗蟲人、魔人菇菇、好肥大的蚊子、嗚啦啦哇噹卡卡其中之一的晶球。要使用，請點擊它兩下，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Sẽ triệu hồi một Giant Carrierbomb, Hoppre, Mushpoie, Iren hoặc Watangka ở gần đó. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
